name: Night Music
summary:
著名实验导演斯坦·布拉哈格的胶片直接作画作品之一。这部是直接画在了IMAX胶片上。
“This little film (originally painted on IMAX) attempts to capture the beauty of sadness, as the eyes have it when closed in meditation on sorrow.” -Stan Brakhage
